Address.label: Address
Address.value: 200 W. OLD WILSON,BRIDGE ROAD, COLUMBUS, Ohio, 43085, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Worthington Steel, Inc. operates as a steel processor and producer. The Company offers manufactures laser welded products consumer and building steel products, as well as pressure cylinders and accessories for applications such as fuel storage, water systems, outdoor living, tools and celebrations. Worthington Steel serves customers worldwide.

value.name: Jeff Klingler
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
